languages.text: Upon receiving lethal damage, if the Cyber-Mastiff has more than 30 stacks of this effect, it doesn't fall unconscious and restores {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} wounds instead.

traits.locale_text: Upon receiving lethal damage, if the Cyber-Mastiff has more than 30 stacks of this effect, it doesn't fall unconscious and restores {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} wounds instead.

languages.text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

languages.text: Получив смертельный урон, кибермастиф остается в строю и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, если у него более 30 уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда кибермастиф получает смертельный урон, он остается активирован и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, если у него есть более 30 уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}.

Когда кибермастиф получает смертельный урон, он остается активирован и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, если у него есть более 30 уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}.

Получив смертельный урон, кибермастиф остается в строю и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, если у него более 30 уровней {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}неистовства{/g}.

languages.text: サイバーマスチフが致命的なダメージを受けた場合、30以上の {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂乱{/g} を持っていれば、発動状態のまま {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復する。
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: サイバーマスチフが致命的なダメージを受けた場合、30以上の {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂乱{/g} を持っていれば、発動状態のまま {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復する。

languages.text: Lorsque le cyber-mastiff subit des dégâts mortels, il reste actif et récupère {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} s'il dispose de plus de 30 cumuls de {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Frénésie{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le cyber-mastiff subit des dégâts mortels, il reste actif et récupère {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} s'il dispose de plus de 30 cumuls de {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Frénésie{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando el cibermastín sufre daño letal, sigue activo y recupera {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} si tiene más de 30 acumulaciones de {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenético{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el cibermastín sufre daño letal, sigue activo y recupera {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} si tiene más de 30 acumulaciones de {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenético{/g}.

languages.text: 如果生化獒犬拥有至少30层{g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂暴{/g}层数，则承受致命伤害时不会倒下，且恢复{uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: 如果生化獒犬拥有至少30层{g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}狂暴{/g}层数，则承受致命伤害时不会倒下，且恢复{uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Erleidet der Cyber-Mastiff tödlichen Schaden, bleibt er aktiv und regeneriert {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, wenn er mehr als 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Rasend{/g}-Stapel hat.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Truculence{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet der Cyber-Mastiff tödlichen Schaden, bleibt er aktiv und regeneriert {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, wenn er mehr als 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}Rasend{/g}-Stapel hat.

languages.text: Siber mastif, ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında 30'dan fazla {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}delirmiş{/g} birikimi varsa aktif kalmaya devam eder ve {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını geri kazanır.
languages.original_text: When the cyber-mastiff suffers lethal damage, it remains activated and regains {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if it has more than 30 {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}frenzied{/g} stacks.

traits.locale_text: Siber mastif, ölümcül hasara maruz kaldığında 30'dan fazla {g|f:6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649}delirmiş{/g} birikimi varsa aktif kalmaya devam eder ve {uip|RestoredWounds|6cf8cf0920bd461aa5bddb4d45d49649} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını geri kazanır.
